original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens stronger at 327.70/328.00 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 327.70/328.00 to the US dollar on Friday, from 328.00/15 the previous day, dealers said.
On the Colombo Stock Exchange, the All Share Price Index was up 0.57 percent at 10,654.
The S&P SL20 was up 1.00 percent at 3,040. Turnover was 64 million.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 was quoted at 13.85/95 percent from 14.10/15 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was quoted at 14.17/22 percent from 14.25/35 percent. (Colombo/Dec1/2023)
